metadata.title: THE NORTH FACE Textured Cap
features: ADVENTURE READY. The Men's Textured Cap Rock Crew combines 58%-recycled materials with a soft jacquard fleece for undeniable comfort and warmth on your journey.

RECYCLED FABRIC. Made from a recycled polyester fleece blend, this crew sweatshirt delivers cozy comfort for casual nights or adventure days. Easy to care for and easy to wear, you'll love the effortless look and feel anywhere you go.

STANDARD FIT. With a flattering shape and ample mobility, this pullover is perfect for easy wear or layering up. Whether for a casual look in town or active days in the wilderness, you'll experience freedom of movement through the shoulders and chest.

FUNCTIONAL VERSATILITY. Never Stop Exploring with thoughtful features that help you go further — a ribbed collar and cuffs ensure a secure fit for activities while a kangaroo handwarmer pocket offers toasty relief for hands when the weather drops.

TAKE ON THE DAY. An essential closet staple, this crew is a go-to classic for hiking, training or just kicking back. Pair it with your favorite joggers, pants or shorts and proudly wear the badge of exploration with The North Face.
